item.title: Free resources for aspiring data adepts
item.description: 1 Why data science? 2 Free resources overview 2.1 Machine learning conceps 2.2 Math basics 2.3 R basics 2.4 Machine learning framework with R 2.5 R online environment 2.6 Online course 2.7 Beautiful intuition 2.8 Blogs 2.9 Help 2.10 YouTube channels 1 Why data science? Data science is of of the most vibrating fields of research and industries at present. Its ubiquity and importance is likely on the rise. Due to its importance, itâ€™s a great place for vivid minds to contribute and to develop.
